definition[0]: a sudden loud sound of laughter
example[0]: We could hear peals of laughter coming from the hall.
example[1]: A loud peal of thunder crashed directly overhead.
definition[2]: the loud ringing sound made by a bell
example[2]: A sudden peal of bells broke the silence.
definition[3]: a musical pattern made by ringing a number of bells one after the other
definition[4]: if bells peal, they ring loudly
example[3]: The bells pealed out on Christmas Day.
